mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO advertise_space_tb (name, platform, type, location, unit_price, now_unit_delivery_number, now_unit_money, status, update_date, admin_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{platform}, #{type}, #{location}, #{unitPrice}, #{nowUnitDeliveryNumber}, #{nowUnitMoney}, #{status}, #{updateDate}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE advertise_space_tb SET name=#{name}, platform=#{platform}, type=#{type}, location=#{location}, unit_price=#{unitPrice}, now_unit_delivery_number=#{nowUnitDeliveryNumber}, now_unit_money=#{nowUnitMoney}, status=#{status}, update_date=#{updateDate}, admin_id=#{adminId} WHERE advertise_space_id=#{advertiseSpaceId}
mapper.select: SELECT advertise_space_id, name, platform, type, location, unit_price, now_unit_delivery_number, now_unit_money, status, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_space_tb WHERE advertise_space_id=#{advertiseSpaceId}

SELECT advertise_space_id, name, platform, type, location, unit_price, now_unit_delivery_number, now_unit_money, status, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_space_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT advertise_space_id, name, platform, type, location, unit_price, now_unit_delivery_number, now_unit_money, status, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_space_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(advertise_space_id) FROM advertise_space_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}
